评论概述: Same size dress in different patterns all fit differently
评论详情: I bought three of the size M dresses in different print patterns and they all fit differently. One was too big, one just right and the other too small. Nice dresses, too bad there is no quality control.  Disappointed.
Costume Quality. Not the best quality.

I love this dress. It is exactly as depicted. I am a 36H chest size 1012 and I ordered an extra large. I'm very borderline and probably could order the large but I liked how comfortable the extra large feels and it's still flattering in the waist and doesn't stretch on my bra.  It's a slightly stretchy quality fabric. Perfect for a cocktail holiday party. I wouldn't wear it without the petit coat just because it wouldn't do it justice with my flat butt. :) Great dress for the price!

I felt like a princess in this dress . I feel like it’s true to size, I’m an XL. I do have a belly, but i feel this dress camouflaged it…and I’m not upset about that. The fabric is soft and stretchy but you can’t tell by looking at it. It’s thicker material as well. I absolutely recommend this dress! Who needs a little black dress if you have this hot red dress!!

评论概述: The white is S H E E R !!

Maybe the colored dresses aren’t as sheer, but the white definitely requires a full nude body suit underneath. Returning- not worth $45

I got so many compliments on this dress. I did buy a petticoat to wear underneath to make it flair a bit. The material is very nice and has a little stretch to it. I am 5'4 160 pounds with large breasts ( 36D). I got a large but could have used a medium.

This dress is such a pleasant surprise! Fit is true to size and seems well made, especially for the price. The fabric is thick (not see through or clingy) but light weight and comfortable. As a 42 year old mom, this dress also is flattering in the tummy area and the cut and shape of the dress is just flattering over all. I will note that they ship this dress in a vacuum sealed bag so it does arrive wrinkly, but after an initial steaming/ironing I think the material will resist wrinkling and creasing. The only thing missing is pockets!

评论概述: RETURNED have not gotten refund - neckline - not as pictured
评论详情: I returned this dress 5 days ago.  The dress neckline is tacked way up high, and is not as it is pictured.  The reason for the 1 star may be more Amazon's fault than that of the dress or it's makers, but I have not gotten a return confirmation or refund yet.  Amazon is saying I have not returned it yet - but I did  and have my UPS store receipts.  But I have to wait 2 weeks to be able to lodge any kind of complaint.  This order (it was a BIG order, with several returns, as I am trying to find a dress for a wedding)  is the first time I have ever had any problems with a return to Amazon.  Frustrating enough to try to find a dress, but, then to be hampered financially for 2 weeks while still looking is problematic.

评论概述: I have 4 of these dresses! Only returned the coral one.
评论详情: This dress is a great find. I orginally purchased the dark red one for my wedding anniversary dinner. I wore it with a black petticoat. The swing skirt hid my tummy and wider hips well and the empire waist showed off my smaller upper torso. I received multiple compliments. I then ordered the dark green, lemon print, and coral version. All, except the coral one, were of the same somewhat silky light stretch fabric. The coral one was made from a different fabric with no comfortable stretch so I returned it. I am 5'7" 160 with 34DD and the large fit well.

I ordered a 3XL and it didn’t fit.  I have ordered that size on other things and it fit perfectly.  But this dress was not labeled right I think.The material is wonderful and the look is great.  But just didn’t fit

评论概述: The fabric is not dyed well, with dye on top of white fabric and not dyed thread.
类型: Size: XX-LargeColor: Black Small White Dot
评论详情: Dress is black & white polka dots. Cut and style of the dress is gorgeous, but too many quality issues. First, the material is heavily synthetic with a lot of elastic give, like 90% synthetic and 10% cotton. The material does not breathe at all. See pictures. Second, material is NOT dyed well. I returned the originally ordered dress because there were white striations in the fabric, especially at seams and where the dress material was folded over for hemming, like the cap sleeves. Now, the replacement 2nd dress is showing the same issues. It’s almost like the black dye was sublimated onto the material versus actually having dyed thread of two colors. The fabric thread is not both black and white— just white. After prewashing the dress in cold water by rinsing it in the shower while it hung on a hanger (no detergent, no bunching it up to wash, did not use a washing machine), the black literally disappeared from the dress in sections. Like bad paint. See pictures. So disappointed. Returning the 2nd dress as the black color is not the initial color of the thread. This poor dye overrides the cute look & cut of the dress & it being sewed well. The synthetic fabric and synthetic color is horrible.
This dress is so beautiful and great . I recommend

I ordered and paid for a dress that was listed as being 98% cotton, 2% spandex as I avoid synthetics when it's beastly hot. I received a dress that was correct.. But their size small was too small for me. So I ordered the same dress one size up.. Small to medium... And got a dress that is 81% rayon, 16% nylon, and 3% elastane... All synthetics.  I don't have time to hunt for a new dress, so this melty synthetic disgusting mess it will be, but let the buyer beware... They're lying to you.  Further, the size small is too small, and the medium too large if you're about 5' and 100 lbs. The bodice is sewn *oddly* on the medium, as well, so I'm having to seamrip it and remove the bizarre bulge made by incorrect pleating under the bustline. *And*, the small came in the dark green I ordered... The medium, despite ordering the exact same way I ordered the small, is teal. Sigh.  Never buying from these sellers or this brand again. >:(

Not see-through, not cheap material. Cut just right. ADORABLE. Maybe I should get another color? Wear a dress. Be cuteness!
